title: ECB’s Kazaks Tells FT Europe Is Already ‘at War’ With Russia
description: Policymakers shouldn’t be “naive” to think that Europe isn’t already “at war” with Russia and central banks need to prepare for further escalation, European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks told the Financial Times.
content: Policymakers shouldn’t be “naive” to think that Europe isn’t already “at war” with Russia and central banks need to prepare for further escalation, European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks told the Financial Times.
